title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect charged with aggravated murder; prosecutors will seek death penalty – live updates
summary: Tyler Robinson has been charged with the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk in Utah. Prosecutors are seeking the death penalty, and Robinson will be held without bail. An attorney detailed the charges against him during a recent court appearance.

title: Tottenham v Villarreal: Champions League – live
summary: The Europa League holders are back in action, returning to the competition with a match in north London. Scott Murray will provide a minute-by-minute report on the event. Fans can follow the updates live as the game unfolds.

title: Athletic Bilbao v Arsenal: Champions League – live
summary: The league stage of the season officially begins in Bilbao. Barry Glendenning provides a minute-by-minute report of the events. Fans can follow along for live updates and highlights.

title: Plan to slash US steel tariffs shelved ahead of Donald Trump’s visit
summary: Ministers aimed to finalize a deal this week to eliminate the president's steel tariffs completely. The agreement is intended to support trade and strengthen economic relations. Achieving this resolution could lead to significant changes in the steel industry.

title: Real Madrid v Marseille, Juventus v Dortmund, and more: Champions League – live
summary: Rob Smyth covers the opening night of the league stage, providing updates on all the goals and key developments. Fans can stay informed with his real-time insights and analysis. Tune in for the latest highlights and crucial moments from the matches.
